meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points of equal brightness.
meanings.sent1: The isophote on the map showed where the brightness was the same.
meanings.sent2: The isophote on the map helped us understand the areas with equal brightness.
meanings.sent3: I followed the isophote on the map like a trail of light.
meanings.sent4: The isophote on the map was like a glowing thread connecting the points.
meanings.sent5: The isophote on the map shimmered with uniform brightness.
